greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - 6*a(n-2), a(0)=0, a(1)=1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-6).
maple: seq(coeff(series(x/(1-2*x+6*x^2),x,n+1), x, n), n = 0 .. 30); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 23 2018
mathematica: Table[Sum[(-5)^k Binomial[n, 2 k + 1], {k, 0, n/2}], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Sep 20 2016 *)
program: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,2,6) for n in range(0, 30)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 23 2009
(PARI) x='x+O('x^30); concat([0], Vec(x/(1-2*x+6*x^2))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 22 2018
(MAGMA) I:=[0,1]; [n le 2 select I[n] else 2*Self(n-1) - 6*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 22 2018
(GAP) a:=[0,1];; for n in [3..30] do a[n]:=2*a[n-1]-6*a[n-2]; od; a; # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 23 2018
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 20 2003
